Similar to part of my problem "not building jobs".
I tested it yesterday al=
so with ubuntu 9 and Sun JRE 1.6 and
had the same trouble. It turned out th=
at it is not the JAVA 6 
version, but the Heritrix 3.0.0.
Don't know why th=
ey have a buggy Heritrix 3.0.0 online for download.
May be we should try 3.=
0.0-RC1 or the latest 3.0.0_SNAPSHOT?

You have to use the 3.1.1_SNAPSHOT. =

It worked for me with Ubuntu 9 and Sun JAVA 6.

Bernd
